paper_title: Ancient pancake solutions to fully nonlinear curvature flows
abstract: We construct $O(1)\times O(n)$-invariant ancient ``pancake'' solutions to a large and natural class of fully nonlinear curvature flows. We then establish that these are the unique $O(n)$-invariant ancient solutions to the corresponding flow which sweep out a slab by carrying out a fine asymptotic analysis for this class. This extends the main results of \cite{BLT} to a surprisingly general class of flows.
